Documentation

Library Used

Velocity.js library was used for animations. This is a graphical library to incorporate animations to text and images.

Npm Commands

To start our running application the following commands will be used.

  • npm init
  • npm install express
  • npm install nodemon
  • npm install @supbase/supabase-js
  • npm start

    • With all the proper installments, the last step is to link our Project Repository to Vercel, and deploy the server
